name: catchment
summary: Generate catchment areas with POI analysis
description:
The catchment command creates travel time zones showing what's reachable within specified times. It generates:

- Isochrone polygons for multiple travel times
- POI analysis within each zone
- Categorized amenity counts

Useful for location analysis, site selection, and accessibility studies.

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: walk, bike, drive (default: walk)
options.-f, --format: Output format: json, geojson, text (default: geojson)

output:
Catchment analysis with:
- Isochrone polygon for each travel time
- POI counts by category (healthcare, food, education, etc.)
- Individual POI locations with travel times
- Origin point marker
